Name: Virtual Hunting Experience
About the game: Virtual Hunting Experience offers hunters the chance at unique hunting simulations full of animals and with no limits. Be careful because not all animals are friendly! Hunt over 6 Full hunt locations for over 30+ animal species, collect trophy animals, and unlock new weapons. -Choose between Day and Night hunting which change the animal that spawn and some animal behaviors. - Full hunt Journal to keep track of trophy animals and other hunting stats. -Score breakdown after each hunt, rack up big money to buy new weapons. -Choose from 6 different locations and shoot for high scores! -5 Unique challenge modes to test even the most skilled hunters. - Steam Leaderboards for those who really wanna show off their skills!
